entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Small Regions 2001. The situation of the disadvantaged Hungarian schools in the area of public education. Parent sample.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-E75s: TÁRKI Small Regions 2001. The situation of the disadvantaged Hungarian schools in the area of public education. Parent sample.. data sheet. Version: 2007-02-12
entry.dcterms:creator: Imre, Anna
entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-03-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: knowledge about schools, the progress of the children at school, opinions about the role of the school, continuing studies, plans about the future of the children
entry.dcterms:subject: education, school
migration
labour and employment
person
survey data
cross-section

As a starting point of the research, 6 underprivileged regions were selected, and all schools within this area was included in the sample. From each school an eighth grade class was selected. All parents of students studying in that class received the questionnaire for completion.
self-administered questionnaire
A
